action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information: In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travelers on dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isn't provided, your booking will be canceled on arrival. In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. Food and beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). Due to coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures. This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties. Please inform 22HOUSING APARTMENT 20 LINH LANG of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 2:00 PM on the day of arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel after 2:00 PM on the day of arrival.

Children older than 1 year are welcome. One child from 1 to 7 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 7 to 18 years is charged VND 100000  per night when using existing beds.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
